    • Method Detail

      • findStorageForSensor

        List<? extends IBasicStorage<?>> findStorageForSensor(String sensorID)
                                                      throws SensorHubException
        Finds storage modules where the specified sensor data is archived
        Parameters:
        sensorID - Local ID of sensor to find existing storage for
        Returns:
        list of storage instances or empty list if none are found
        Throws:
        SensorHubException

      • getDefaultStorageConfig

        StorageConfig getDefaultStorageConfig(Class<?> storageClass)
                                      throws SensorHubException
        Gets the default config for the specified storage type
        Parameters:
        storageClass - Concrete storage class
        Returns:
        default config class, pre-filled with proper information
        Throws:
        SensorHubException
